title: Gorky Park
creator_credit: Michael Apted, Howard W. Koch, Gene Kirkwood, Eagle Associates and Orion Pictures Corporation
brief_description: Relentlessly thrilling from its shocking beginning to its spine-chilling end. William Hurt is a Russian Police Inspector investigating a ruthless triple murder in Moscow’s Gorky Park. The victims’ faces and fingers are missing and the KGB is trying to cover it up. Stars Lee Marvin, Brian Dennehy, Ian Bannen and introducing Joanna Pacula. Filmed entirely in Helsinki. The screenplay by Dennis Potter is based upon the novel by Martin Cruz Smith.
